title: Tales from the Id
description: James Prine introduces a variety of interesting characters in this unique collection of short a mysterious police sergeant who knows more about crucifixions than he should; Vikings who got a little more than they bargained for; Leviticus seen in a new way; an unforgettable war-time event in North Vietnam; the quest of a middle-aged man longing for the past; fighting a house fire in New Orleans; attending a policeman's funeral; and an individual who flies like a bird.These stories are highly recommended for anyone who occasionally enjoys straying off the beaten path.
author: James S. Prine
